cause.description:
P.A.V. is a cause for all walks of life to end violence,not just here at home..but there respected native homelands. Our goal is to wipe out violence by the year 2045, to help make this goal possible we need the support of everyone from all corners of the earth. To come together and help put a stop to sense less killing,raping,assaulting,etc... plz join me ladies and gentlemen to help make this world a place for the future generations to come.
1. Violence is un-exceptable
2. Violence will not be tolerated
3. Violence is not right anywhere
cause.mission: Eliminate violence for the future of our chiuldren
cause.name: People against violence
